history.proof: intros n m p H1 H2. strivial use: Z.mul_lt_mono_pos_l.

ctx: intros n m p H1 H2.
exceptions.exn: In environment n, m, p : Z H1 : 0 < p H2 : p * n < p * m Unable to unify "(?M1410 * p ?= ?M1411 * p) = Lt" with "(n ?= m) = Lt".

ctx: intros n m p H1 H2.
exceptions.exn: In environment n, m, p : Z H1 : 0 < p H2 : p * n < p * m Unable to unify "0 < p" with "n < m".

ctx: intros n m p H1 H2.
exceptions.exn: In environment n, m, p : Z H1 : 0 < p H2 : p * n < p * m Unable to unify "0 < p" with "0 < p * n".

ctx: intros n m p H1 H2.
exceptions.exn: In environment n, m, p : Z H1 : 0 < p H2 : p * n < p * m Unable to unify "p * n < p * m" with "0 < p * n".

original: intros n m p H1 H2. apply Zmult_lt_compat_r with (p := p). apply H1. apply Zmult_lt_reg_r with (p := p * n). apply H1. apply H2.
